Gridmanager.js v 0.3.1

GitHub Demos Docs

Demos:

Themes:

  • Default Theme
    - No rich text editor loaded: just uses browsers native functionality
  • Light Theme Example
    - Example using gridmanager-light.css
  • Dark Theme Example
    - Example using gridmanager-dark.css

With Rich Text Editors

  • TinyMCE Version
    - TinyMCE loaded (N.B requires jquery adapter), default config
  • CKEditor Version
    - CKEditor loaded (N.B requires jquery adapter), default config
  • CKEditor Custom Version
    - CKEditor loaded (N.B requires jquery adapter), with custom config file

Custom

  • Custom Columns
    - Example configuration for custom column presets
  • Custom Controls
    - Example configuration for custom row and col controls
  • Multiple instances
    - Really not recommended, just here for kicks.
  • Fluid Layout
    - A couple of options needed to turn row into row-fluid
  • Foundation Version
    - Foundation CSS variant
